name: Crafter 2D
description:
What happened? What are you doing on lost island?
Escape from the cube island!

You were on a cubic tropical island.
You will have to survive! You are alone with the wildlife!
Now you have to look for food, craft tools and build a house to survive at night!
If you're ready, survive on lost island!

Crafter 2D game features:
+ Explore large cubic 2d island!
+ Search food or secret items!
+ Craft and construction!
+ Multiple weapons, such as a pick, axe!
+ Various enemy!
+ New 2d survival!
+ Cool cubic graphics!

You're ready to survive on the 2d cube world island?
Hold on the island as long as possible!
Survive! Good luck!
